detectors.description: Variable BlockonomiToken._totalSupply (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BlockonomiToken.sol#39) is not in mixedCase

BlockonomiToken.constructor() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BlockonomiToken.sol#49-57) uses literals with too many digits:
	- _totalSupply = 100000000000000000000000000 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BlockonomiToken.sol#53)
detectors.markdown:

detectors.description:

	- BlockonomiToken.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BlockonomiToken.sol#71-75)

safeDiv(uint256,uint256) should be declared external:
